did.abstract: Letter to Andrew Hickenlooper, Jr., from Schuyler Hamilton concerning the Society of the Army of the Tennessee. Includes an extract from the Society's Proceedings.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.p: Andrew Hickenlooper letter, 1885, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.p: This finding aid was derived from a MARC record using a crosswalk defined in marc2ead_sectionA.xsl. The finding aid was generated as part of a larger project to digitize several thousand small collections housed in Section A, November 2021.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Andrew Hickenlooper was a resident of Cincinnati, Hamilton County, Ohio.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Letter to Andrew Hickenlooper, Jr., from Schuyler Hamilton concerning the Society of the Army of the Tennessee. Includes an extract from the Society's Proceedings.
